item.endrem.old_eye.description: §7§oLegends say this eye once belonged to one of the great Sandworms
item.endrem.rogue_eye.description: §7§oYou found this on the floor of your tavern, it likely belongs to a villager.
item.endrem.nether_eye.description: §7§oThe Wither was corrupted by Void Energy, you picked up the remains.
item.endrem.cold_eye.description: §7§oYou collected this from Bueford, it kind of smells like... popcorn butter?
item.endrem.magical_eye.description: §7§oThis eye glows bright blue, you feel at peace when you touch it.
item.endrem.black_eye.description: §7§oYou can feel the magical energy of the Pixie's surging out of this.
item.endrem.lost_eye.description: §7§oIt is told that it was forged by the first blacksmiths of time
item.endrem.wither_eye.description: §7§oAn adventurer must have thrown this useless piece of junk on the ground. Unlucky for them, you love junk!
item.endrem.guardian_eye.description: §7§oShould have guessed that a land made of sweets and candies would produce a mystical artifact made of chewing gum....
item.endrem.cursed_eye.description: §7§oCreated when the Cult of the Void used Pixie Magic to create a new dimension.
item.endrem.exotic_eye.description: §7§oThe eye of the first Fey Queen
item.endrem.evil_eye.description: §7§oThis eye popped out of one of those creepy dolls you were fighting.
item.endrem.undead_eye.description: §7§oRemembrance of the past lives of those who live in death
item.endrem.cryptic_eye.description: §7§oCreated when a Dimension separated into many other separate dimensions during the Plastimpocalypse.
item.endrem.corrupted_eye.description: §7§oThe eye of a greedy king that faded in solitude; legend says it will bring infinite fortune to its owner
item.endrem.witch_eye.description: §7§oBarnaby was protecting this object, so naturally you decide to take it from him.
block.endrem.ender_eye.throw_warning: This eye doesn't know where to go
block.endrem.ender_eye.use_warning: This eye doesn't want to be used
block.endrem.custom_eye.frame_has_eye: This frame already has an eye
block.endrem.custom_eye.broken: This portal is not built properly
